underlying_goal: Adapt a proposal document into a formal specification, removing weighted scores in favor of measuring scheming dimensions independently.
primary_success: Successfully adapted a proposal into a formal spec, correctly interpreting the key instruction to replace weighted composite scores with independent, unweighted metrics and adding a clear rationale for the change.
brief_summary: The user asked the agent to adapt a proposal document into a new spec. The agent correctly understood the core requirement to replace arbitrary weighted scores with independent metrics, creating `specs/SCHEMING_EXTENSIONS.md` with the revised, more robust measurement approach.
